# simd_quaternion(_:_:_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

-  simd_quaternion(_:_:_:_:) 

Function# simd_quaternion(_:_:_:_:)



```
func simd_quaternion(
    _ ix: Float16,
    _ iy: Float16,
    _ iz: Float16,
    _ r: Float16
) -> simd_quath
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/simd/simd_quaternion(_:_:_:_:)-9u5ci#parameters)

`ix`The first component of the imaginary (vector) part.

`iy`The second component of the imaginary (vector) part.

`iz`The third component of the imaginary (vector) part.

`r`The real (scalar) part.

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_quaternion(_:_:_:_:)-9u5ci#discussion)

Constructs a quaternion from four scalar values.
